newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn cattle market roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn cattle market roundup - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were not well tested on Monday, compared to Friday, USDA said.
Trade was slow. Demand and seller interest light. Offerings light and current.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1200-1300 lbs few lds and pt lds 68.50-70.50. Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1300 lbs few lds and pt lds 68.50-70.50.
Most cattle delivered to packing plants with weighing conditions equivalent to 3 percent shrink at feedlots with some being bought on a picked up (FOB) basis.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to Fridays close - Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lbs 111.00-112.00 Holstein (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 104.00-105.00. Holstein (grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs 105.00 Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs 100.00. Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1175 lbs 111.00-111.50
Wk to Date - 3,400 Week Ago - 5,400 Year Ago - 7,200
